net.minecraftforge.common.crafting

接口 IShapedRecipe

  • 所有超级接口:
    IForgeRegistryEntry<IRecipe>, IRecipe
    所有已知实现类:
    RecipesMapExtending, ShapedOreRecipe, ShapedRecipes

    public interface IShapedRecipe
extends IRecipe
    Used to mark a recipe that shape matters so that the recipe book and auto crafting picks the correct shape. Note: These methods can't be named 'getHeight' or 'getWidth' due to obfusication issues.

    • 嵌套类概要

      • 从接口继承的嵌套类/接口 net.minecraftforge.registries.IForgeRegistryEntry

        IForgeRegistryEntry.Impl<T extends IForgeRegistryEntry<T>>

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法

      int getRecipeWidth()

        canFit, getCraftingResult, getGroup, getIngredients, getRecipeOutput, getRemainingItems, isDynamic, matches

      • 从接口继承的方法 net.minecraftforge.registries.IForgeRegistryEntry

        getRegistryName, getRegistryType, setRegistryName
